original_text: Barzillai the Gileadite also came down from Rogelim to cross the Jordan with the king and to send him on his way from there.
korean_text: 길르앗 사람 바르실래가 왕이 요단을 건너가게 하려고 로글림에서 내려와 함께 요단에 이르니

sentences.original_text: Barzillai the Gileadite also came down from Rogelim
to cross the Jordan with the king
and to send him on his way from there
